content:
Under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage, windscreen cover is unlimited, with a windscreen excess of $100 unless the windscreen is repaired at an HL Assurance Appointed Windscreen Repairer.
Under the Your Liability to Third Parties coverage, damage to third party property is covered up to S$5,000,000.
Under the Your Liability to Third Parties coverage, death or injury to a third party is covered for an unlimited amount.
questions: What is the excess amount for windscreen replacement under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage?
Is there a limit on the coverage amount for windscreen repair under the Loss or Damage to Your Car coverage?
Where should I get my windscreen repaired to avoid paying the excess?
What is the maximum coverage amount for damage to third party property under the Your Liability to Third Parties coverage?
Is there a coverage limit for death or injury to a third party under the Your Liability to Third Parties coverage?
What are the financial protections offered if I damage someone else's property with my car?
How much does it cost to repair a windscreen with an appointed repairer under the HL Assurance policy?
What are the benefits of using an HL Assurance Appointed Windscreen Repairer?
Can I get unlimited windscreen cover under my car insurance policy?
What is the maximum amount covered for third party property damages in an accident?
